metadata.title: CVE-2019-0136 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient access control in the Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi Softwaredriver before version 21.10 may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via adjacent access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
